page.title: 15Farming in Cronton
page.content: {Farming}There are 5 farms in the Cronton area. {Patten's Farm}This is one of the longest established in the area and is typical of those found in the district. The farmer has 200 acres of land,and has not kept animals since 1969.The farm house is 385 years old and has been the farm house since 1928. {Crops}The farmer grows potatoes, wheat, barley and oats. Modern methods of cultivation are used to improve the yeald. {Machinery,employment}The farmer owns 4 tractors and a combine harvester, to help with the harvesting of these crops. He also has a grain drier which can take 300-350 tons of grain. Two farm workers are employed to help with the work throughout the year.
